about_the_game:
Beyond The Gates is a 2-4 player online co-op horror which mainly focuses on the story line. Discover the truth behind a dark mystery that has been hidden until now.

Strange Disappearances
There had been strange disappearances in the village during the last few years, People that went to the castle didn't return and there had been no news from the castle itself, it's like everyone is dead. I'm heading to the castle to find out what is going on, everyone is trying to warn me about an apparent evil. I just hope I will return safely and find out what the hell is going on in that damn castle.

  • Single player mode
In this mode you can try to solve the mystery on your own, only for the hardcore horror experience.

  • Online Co-Op
In this mode you and your friends will try to solve the mystery, you must work together because this game requires teamwork.

  • Continued story line
With each update the main story line will be continued and improved upon, with new features and mechanics.

  • Insane difficulty
Are you having it easy beating the game on normal? Try Insane mode if you think you are brave enough.

  • Silence
Great atmospheric feeling, especially if you turn off the "ambient noise" you will hear nothing but dead silence.

  • Replayability
Each playthrough will be different, spawns are randomized ensuring maximum replayability.

highlighted.name: Damn son, how did you do this ?!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may not be appropriate for all ages, it contains Violence / Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Beyond The Gates is a 2-4 player online co-op horror which mainly focuses on the story line. Discover the truth behind a dark mystery that has been hidden until now.

Strange Disappearances
There had been strange disappearances in the village during the last few years, People that went to the castle didn't return and there had been no news from the castle itself, it's like everyone is dead. I'm heading to the castle to find out what is going on, everyone is trying to warn me about an apparent evil. I just hope I will return safely and find out what the hell is going on in that damn castle.

  • Single player mode
In this mode you can try to solve the mystery on your own, only for the hardcore horror experience.

  • Online Co-Op
In this mode you and your friends will try to solve the mystery, you must work together because this game requires teamwork.

  • Continued story line
With each update the main story line will be continued and improved upon, with new features and mechanics.

  • Insane difficulty
Are you having it easy beating the game on normal? Try Insane mode if you think you are brave enough.

  • Silence
Great atmospheric feeling, especially if you turn off the "ambient noise" you will hear nothing but dead silence.

  • Replayability
Each playthrough will be different, spawns are randomized ensuring maximum replayability.

name: Beyond The Gates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 (5th Gen) or AMD FX 8500+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 or AMD R7 370
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We recommend your graphics card has at least 3GB of VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 (6th Gen) or AMD Ryzen 5 (1st Gen)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Beyond The Gates is a 2-4 player online co-op horror which mainly focuses on the storyline. Discover the truth behind a dark mystery that has been hidden until now.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
